concept.title: Add Block to Library Dialog Box
concept.shortdesc: The Add Block to Library dialog box creates a block definition and adds it to the Library.

section.title: Selection set
section.p: Specifies which entities are included in the block definition. You can select entities in the drawing or use the entire drawing.

section.title: Name
section.p: Specifies the name of the block.

section.title: Category
section.p: Specifies a category for the block. You can choose from a list of existing categories or enter a new category name.

section.title: Location
section.p: Specifies the location where the block dwg will be saved. Available locations are controlled by the Library directory path setting ( System Variable).

section.title: Show/Hide Options
section.p: Shows or hides additional options. The available options depend on the selection set.

section.title: Change current
section.p: Species what happens to selected entities after the block is created. You can choose to retain the individual entities, convert them to a block insertion using the new definition, or delete them. This option is only available if you define the selection set by choosing to Select entities in drawing.

section.title: Insertion units
section.p: Specifies the units for the block insertion. You can choose from the following list of standard units:

Specifies the base point for block definition. You can pick a point in the drawing or enter X,Y,Z coordinates. This option is only available if you define the selection set by choosing to Select entities in drawing.

section.title: Create
section.p: Creates a DWG file for the block definition in the specified location, adds the block to the library panel under the specified category, and closes the dialog box.

section.title: Cancel
section.p: Closes the dialog box without creating the block definition.
